duties_responsibilities.duty: Analyze and design analog and digital electronic circuits including analog signal conditioning, DC-DC power conversion, and communication interfaces
Integrate, test, troubleshoot, and verify electrical hardware
Develop test criteria and assist in the design of test systems
Perform component and architecture trade studies to determine optimal system solutions to design hardware and electronics based on commercial and industry components and technologies

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering or a related field (Master's preferred)
